news.title: Google Explains Why Syndicators May Outrank Original Publishers
news.description: Despite Googleâ€™s efforts to give priority to the original source when ranking content, publishers who do not require syndicators to use canonical tags or blocking may be outranked.

news.title: Google Makes Changes to GMB Listings With Distance-Based Service Areas
news.description: As part of an ongoing phase-out process, all remaining Google My Business Listings using distance-based service areas will soon be changed to instead reflect the closest named area.

news.title: Organic Search Responsible For 53% of All Site Traffic, Paid 15% [Study]
news.description: New research indicates that organic and paid search drive almost 70% of trackable website traffic, with social media having remained flat at around 5% for the past five years.

news.title: Google Officially Adds Timestamps to Videos in Search Results
news.description: Google is introducing timestamps for YouTube videos that appear in search results, a move designed to make it easier for users to find content that is contained within a video.
